analysis.description:
LifCrowdsale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/23/0x14daf37c4b3626f91d791fe34cc9faf17a61dcbf.sol#1260-1293) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- foundationWallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/23/0x14daf37c4b3626f91d791fe34cc9faf17a61dcbf.sol#1277-1278)
	- foundationWallet.transfer(foundationBalanceCapWei) (/unique_chucks/23/0x14daf37c4b3626f91d791fe34cc9faf17a61dcbf.sol#1284-1285)
	- MVM.fund.value(mmFundBalance)() (/unique_chucks/23/0x14daf37c4b3626f91d791fe34cc9faf17a61dcbf.sol#1291-1292)
